characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: Model with a Vexilla Magnifica only. The Faith Absolute replaces that modelâ€™s vexilla: it loses the Custodes Vexilla ability. Instead, friendly IMPERIUM INFANTRY and BIKER units within 6" of the bearer in the Morale phase automatically pass Morale tests, and the bearer can attempt to deny one psychic power in each enemy Psychic phase as if they were a PSYKER.
